CustomField.description: NICC-026723 This was originally created for Salesforce Change Requests. This field displays the change request that was used for the UAT (SBFULL) Sandbox deployment. This field is required for all Production deployments
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This was originally created for Salesforce Change Requests. This field displays the change request that was used for the UAT (SBFULL) Sandbox deployment. This field is required for all Production deployments
CustomField.label: Related Change Request
CustomField.relationshipLabel: NI Change Control Requests (Related Change Request)
